FAQ

Is Bettettext free?

At Bettertext, we offer a 3-day free trial with access to all features, allowing users to experience the full potential of our app. After the trial period, users can choose to upgrade to our Premium plan for continued access to all features, including an unlimited number of daily responses and all the advanced options.

Is Bettertext compatible with languages other than English?

Yes, Bettertext supports other languages besides English. When a user highlights text in a non-English language, Bettertext will detect the language and generate an English answer based on that text using its language translation feature. This makes Bettertext a valuable tool for non-native English speakers looking to improve their writing skills in English.
